page.title: 02SCHOOLS 2
page.content:
Aldingbourne junior school is 10 years old.It has a headmistress,5 teachers,3 midday supervisors,3 kitchen{staff},a secretary and a welfare assistant.There are 150 pupils aged 5-11.There are five classes working under a broad-based curriculum. The school has many{facilities}which include a swimming pool,large hall and a computer.There are also several clubs,e.g.craft,music and swimming. The{uniform}is grey and blue but not very strict.They have an assembly each morning.On Monday a priest visits the school, and on Thursday they have hymn practice.
By Elizabeth Binns and Louise Dodd.
